info.header: Nokia Siemens FlexiNG NG3.0;NG2.1;NG2.0;NG10CD8;NG10CD6;NG10CD4;NG10CD2 GTP_U_v1 GTPU measurement dump
info.csv_title: Nokia Siemens FlexiNG NG3.0;NG2.1;NG2.0;NG10CD8;NG10CD6;NG10CD4;NG10CD2 GTP_U_v1 GTPU measurement dump

kpi_info.title: period_duration
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_SUPP_EXT_HDR_NOTIF_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent Supported Extension Headers Notification messages. UPDATED: Updated when a Supported Extension Headers Notification message is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ERROR_INDICATION_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent Error Indication messages. UPDATED: Updated when an Error Indication message is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ECHO_RESPONSE_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent GTP-U Echo Response messages. UPDATED: Updated when a GTP-U Echo Response message is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ERROR_INDICATION_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of Error Indication messages received. UPDATED: Updated when an Error Indication message is received.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ECHO_REQUEST_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received Echo Request messages. UPDATED: Updated when an Echo Request message is received.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_UNKN_OR_UNSUPP_MESG_RECV
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received GTP-U messages that have an unsupported message type or are unknown or faulty in some way. UPDATED: Updated when Flexi NG receives a GTP-U message with an unsupported message type or the request is otherwise faulty (for example; has an invalid message length; invalid protocol version; invalid protocol type; the N-PDU flag is on; or the message is falsely decoded). The reason for updating the counter is that a remote network element has sent an invalid packet or GTP-U message.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Background. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Background is received; a matching user plane session is found.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_CONV
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Conversational. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Conversational is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_IACT1
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1 is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_IACT2
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2 is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_IACT3
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3 is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_QOS_STRM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Streaming. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Streaming is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_RAT_2G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets when the access type is GERAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is GERAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_RAT_3G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets when the access type is UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is UTRAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_LTE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets when the access type is E-UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is E-UTRAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_RAT_UNKN
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets when the access type is unknown (that is; the access type was not received by Flexi NG or the access type is not GERAN; UTRAN; or E-UTRAN). UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is unknown; a matching user plane session is found.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Background. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Background is received; a matching user plane session is found.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_CONV
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Conversational. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Conversational is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_IACT1
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1 is received; a matching user plane session is found and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_IACT2
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2 is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_IACT3
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3 is received; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_QOS_STRM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets with QoS class Streaming. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Streaming is received; a matching user plane session is found and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_RAT_2G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets when the access type is GERAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is GERAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_RAT_3G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets when the access type is UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is UTRAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_LTE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets when the access type is E-UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is E-UTRAN; a matching user plane session is found; and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_RAT_UNKN
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of received G-PDU packets when the access access type is unknown (that is; the access type was not received by Flexi NG or the access type is not GERAN; UTRAN; or E-UTRAN). UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received and the access type is unknown; a matching user plane session is found.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Background. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Background is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_CONV
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Conversational. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Conversational is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_IACT1
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_IACT2
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_IACT3
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_QOS_STRM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Streaming. UPDATED: The value is updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Streaming is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_RAT_2G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is GERAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is GERAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_RAT_3G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is UTRAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_LTE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is E-UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the session access type is E-UTRAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_RAT_UNKN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is unknown. Unknown type means that the access type was not received by Flexi NG; or the access type is not GERAN; UTRAN or E-UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the session access type is unknown.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Background. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Background is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_CONV
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Conversational. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Conversational is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_IACT1
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_IACT2
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 2 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_IACT3
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 3 is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_QOS_STRM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with QoS class Streaming. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet with QoS class Streaming is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_RAT_2G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets with GERAN access type. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is GERAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_RAT_3G
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is UTRAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_LTE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is E-UTRAN. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is E-UTRAN.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_RAT_UNKN
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of bytes of sent G-PDU packets when the access type is unknown (that is; the access type was not received by Flexi NG or the access type is not GERAN; UTRAN; or E-UTRAN). UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent and the access type is unknown.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_END_MARKER_MESSAGES_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of End Marker messages sent. UPDATED: Updated when an End Marker message is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_RECV_DT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU packets in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is received in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. A matching user plane session is found and the packet is counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_PKTS_SENT_DT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU packets in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU packet is sent in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_RECV_DT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received G-PDU bytes in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU byte is received in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. A matching user plane session is found and the bytes are counted for charging purposes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_GPDU_BYTES_SENT_DT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent G-PDU bytes in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when a G-PDU byte is sent in PDN connections where direct tunnel is enabled.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ECHO_REQUESTS_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sent Echo Request messages. UPDATED: Updated when an Echo Request message is sent.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ECHO_RESPONSE_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received Echo Response messages. UPDATED: Updated when an Echo Response message is received.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_ECHO_REQ_RESEND_EXCEED_N3
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of times the Echo Request message resends have exceeded the maximum retries (N3). UPDATED: Updated when an Echo Request message resend exceeds the maximum retries (N3).

kpi_info.title: GTPU_DHCPV6_PKTS_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of received DHCPv6 messages.Updated when an DHCPv6 T-PDU packet is recieved from the S11 interface.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_PKTS_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of GTP-U packets received. UPDATED: Updated when a GTP-U packet is received from any of the interface.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_PKTS_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of GTP-U packets sent. UPDATED: Updated when a GTP-U packet is sent through any of the interface.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_BYTES_RECEIVED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of GTP-U bytes received. UPDATED: Updated when a GTP-U packet is received from any of the interface.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_BYTES_SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of GTP-U bytes sent. UPDATED: Updated when a GTP-U packet is sent through any of the interface.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_UPLINK_THROUGHPUT
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the GTP-U uplink throughput. UPDATED: Updated every 5 seconds according to the received GTP-U bytes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_DOWNLINK_THROUGHPUT
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the GTP-U downlink throughput. UPDATED: Updated every 5 seconds according to the sent GTP-U bytes.

kpi_info.title: GTPU_DT_RNC_ERR_IND_TRANSITION
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of transitions from direct tunnel to two tunnel due to error indication from RNC. UPDATED: Updated when an error indication message is received from RNC when the direct tunnel is enabled.
